front.title: Basic Messaging and Presence Interworking between the Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP) and Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) for Instant Messaging and Presence Leveraging Extensions (SIMPLE)

abstract.t: This document defines a bi-directional protocol mapping for use by gateways that enable the exchange of presence information and single instant messages between systems that implement the Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP) and those that implement the basic extensions to the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) for instant messaging and presence.
